website_summaries.verdict: This table is a bridge between casual rec room players and experienced foosball players. Includes a set of counterbalanced players for advanced action.
pros: Includes 2 sets of players, including a 1 or 3 goalie configuration
Each leg can be leveled independently
cons: Some dead spots between players, especially 5 player rods
Rods can become warped, causing unbalanced play

customer_reviews.title: Great, but need some tinkering
customer_reviews.text: For the price I think it's hard to beat. Was able to put it together in about 2 hrs myself (needed another pair of hands to flip it though). The action is ok; the men need balancing (plenty of after-market or diy solutions); there are some dead spots which you can avoid with more positive ball handling. The playing surface isn't flat... Which is a bother. I'll probably address that in the near future. In short it's a great economical table if you don't mind tinkering with it a bit to meet your expectations.
customer_reviews.author: phegos

customer_reviews.title: Great table.
customer_reviews.text: Got the table as a family Christmas gift. Family loves it and it adds one more thing to keep people occupied during parties. Very sturdy and well made. I would highly recommend this table.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Great foosball table and absolutely the best customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Great foosball table and absolutely the best customer service. I had a couple of rods that would not stay in place and kept rotating so the players were horizontal. Sent an email to Carrom customer service and got a quick response and solution to the problem. They sent out new rods and problem solved. Overall this is a great foosball table and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JDMG

customer_reviews.title: This is the one.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table a year ago and spent a good deal of time researching which one to get. I love it. It took the better part of a day to assemble (while the kids were in school) but they absolutely love it. It's great when their friends come over and challenge the adults to a match and it is a sturdy table - I know this will hold up as my son's and their friends move into teenage years. And I love the cup holders for my beers - there, I said it! I am very, very pleased I bought this table from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Blow Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Nice table
customer_reviews.text: I did my homework. This table has all the bells n whistles of the way more expensive tables. Got it for me n my friends to play on football Sundays. The carrom signature is well built. The corner ramps make it a faster paced game. They are plastic inserts but you know what they work real well. The hollow rods and counter balanced men make it a hundred times better than my last table. So for me this table is a 5 star. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Nick r Flores jr

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended product!
customer_reviews.text: High quality product! This sturdy, well made action game has fast become the go-to entertainment at the house! The weight and specifications in the product mechanics provide solid and rapid-fire Foosball game play.
customer_reviews.author: bythebeach

customer_reviews.title: Really sturdy table. Solid
customer_reviews.text: Really sturdy table. Solid, well built. The corner pieces are molded plastic and a bit more fragile than everything else but they are basically just cup holders so no big deal. Had an issue with assembly but customer service was very helpful and friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Bravoking

customer_reviews.title: ball return at ends instead of sides.
customer_reviews.text: The only flaw, and though it may seem small, is that I wish I had know the ball returns are at each end instead of on the side. The side return is easier to keep track of points and you don't have to interrupt game to get balls into play. A small thing but if I had to do again I would have looked for a table with this feature.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: A sturdy and attractive foosball table
customer_reviews.text: Great table, easy to assemble (if one is careful and watches the Carrom videos on YouTube). The table is sturdy and looks nice. I have just played the first couple of matches but I truly believe this table will be in our family for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lopes

customer_reviews.title: Good, sturdy table.
customer_reviews.text: Great table. Very sturdy. Assembly takes time but is not too difficult. Only 4 stars because the instructions are somewhat vague.
customer_reviews.author: P. Hanlin

customer_reviews.title: how much better can it be
customer_reviews.text: As an OLD foosballer, I can attest to the rugged construction, the smooth bearings and the overall high quality of this table. I have no idea how much better another could be because after 35 years of foosballing, this is equal to any I have used. Maybe if there was a cooler in it that self loaded the drink holders......
customer_reviews.author: zack

customer_reviews.title: We love it! A little tricky to put together
customer_reviews.text: We love it! A little tricky to put together, but we did it. Very sturdy and the balanced players are a must. I don't know if we will ever use the others. It was delivered before Christmas, another plus, so the surprise was complete. The table has already had hours of enjoyment!
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: World Cup fooseball tournament here we come!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as gift knowing it would get lots of use from former "college fooseball pros". Great quality and great looking! It took some time to assemble but not difficult - just time consuming. It is delivered in a very sturdy box but It is very heavy - make sure you have able bodies to get into your house or where ever you are setting up. We were required to have people help off load from truck. 209# doesn't seem that heavy but it is when it's a long, wide box! Again, very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: k joslyn

customer_reviews.title: This table rocks.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table. It takes a beating, and the action is great. Set up is reactively simple. Best to have a cordless screwdriver. Other advice: watch the installation video on the DVD it comes with. It gives better instruction than the manual.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our upstairs game room. It is well built and solid. It also came well packaged. We have already had lot of fun with it. When company comes over it is always a great time.
customer_reviews.author: Bueller

customer_reviews.title: but everything went smoothly and it provided great entertainment for all ages throughout the holidays
customer_reviews.text: I worried that we'd have problems assembling this on Christmas Day, but everything went smoothly and it provided great entertainment for all ages throughout the holidays. Of course, it's particle board, not solid wood, but it seems quite sturdy. Plus, it's affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Amlung

customer_reviews.title: Why list the price as one thing in the title if that's not the price?
customer_reviews.text: I love the table. Sturdy, fun - not too hard to assemble. That said... Title was "$530.00 Signature Foosball Table", but you get charged over $700 for it. Still worth it. But raised a question.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best family fun...EVER!
customer_reviews.text: As our children have aged, they become more distant. As the economy continues to affect our lifestyle more often than not, we have had to settle for limiting costly family activities. Although there was not much under the tree this year there was one big box...the Carrom Foosball table. It has been the best investment and family building experience. The teenagers in the house challange the adults and the adults don't have to keep wondering where the teenagers are. They are in our house with their friends. What more could we ask for!!! It is truly fun for all and a great family bonding experience.
customer_reviews.author: The King Family

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Great table! I ordered this for a busy office and it probably sees 20- 30 games per day. So far it has held up great after a few months and the drink holders are sweet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: We really like this table for the price. BE CAREFUL WHEN ASSEMBLING! The wood isn't that strong - but if you take your time and put it together right - it's a really great table for the money...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great table except some of the rods are warped causing unbalanced players even with the balanced men.
customer_reviews.author: Ian T.

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It took us several hours to assemble this table but it is well-made, sturdy and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Karenita

customer_reviews.title: Great table only flaw was one of the cup holders ...
customer_reviews.text: Great table only flaw was one of the cup holders was broke had to super glue it. Easy to put together instructions were very helpful. Would recommend this table any body.
customer_reviews.author: John Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Pain in the rear to put together but overall great table
customer_reviews.text: This table is a pain to put togethr. First of all the predrilled holes only go so far in and you have to do the rest yourself. There is no lable on the screws so you pretty much have to count the quanity to know which screw to use. Other then that great table and the cup holders make it that much better.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan marshall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love our new foosball table! I can see many battles taking place in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Table is great. Although the directions aren't the simplest it was fairly easy to put together. Quality of the table is excellent and we are very happy with our purchase
customer_reviews.author: Joe Anis

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: Fun for the whole family, It is very attractive in person. It looks like a well made piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun family entertainment. Set up is a little tedious, but worth it in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good game for the family
customer_reviews.text: The table is generally well built and does play well. The only issue is that the playing surface is a bit too thin, and flexes. Even when the table is level, some parts are not exactly. Its not bad, just not as good as the rest.
customer_reviews.author: dr_lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Good value for money. The assembly instructions provided from the manufacterer could be better. Would suggest using a combination of the provided instruction and the video instruction found on YouTube
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: We received this today and we are returning it. I researched foosball tables for a long time before purchasing. My husband and I were appalled by how poorly made this product was, considering the price tag. We expected quality and instead received a cheap table with crummy screws and parts. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Mcintyre

customer_reviews.title: Delivered by an unhelpful driver that left it on a ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivered by an unhelpful driver that left it on a palette that we had to dispose of. No help to get it to the second floor. After all was said and done there were bolts, washers and screws missing from the kit, all of which have had to be purchased separately and have caused an inconvenience. Not that impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, though time-consuming. Make it a project with your kid. Solid piece of gaming equipment likely to withstand years of teenage abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Shumel

product_meta.title: Carrom Signature Foosball Table
product_meta.description: Carrom®'s Signature Foosball Table adds a sophisticated touch to any game room. It has two sets of players with one- or three-player goalie options, wooden handles with precision bearings, and wooden scoring beads.
feature_bullets: Cabinet is Wild Cherry wood laminated (sides and ends)
3/8 inch thick wear resistant play surface
Premium counter balanced players with cross-hatch toe design for superior control
Signature style" includes: four drink holders (removable), leg levelers, 2" leg supports, scoring beads and wood handles

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
